p.s: In my opinion the scene of the movie isn't faithful enough because in the novel, which is written by Angie Thomas, the skin colour of the police officers is underlined more than in the movie.
In the novel you also got to see stereotypes of Maverick, which the officers used without awareness.
But in the movie stereotypes weren't as much as in the novel.
The purpose of Angie Thomas in the novel's sequence also was to show that we have to stop thinking stereotypical, but in the movie it seemed like George Tillmann Jr. hadn't the purpose to do that.
